content: Singer Aaron Carter, who has previously been forthcoming about his substance abuse and eating disorder, is now opening up about his sexuality.  The 29-year-old brother of Backstreet Boys alum Nick Carter tweeted on Saturday night a long open letter in which he acknowledges his attraction to both men and women since he was 13.  "Thereâ€™s something Iâ€™d like to say that I feel is important for myself and my identity that has been weighing on my chest for nearly half of my life," he wrote. "This doesnâ€™t bring me shame, just a weight and burden I have held onto for a long time that I would like lifted off me."  He explains, "I grew up in this entertainment industry at a very young age and when I was around 13 years old I started to find boys and girls attractive."  He then reveals, "There were years that went by that I thought about, but it wasnâ€™t until I was 17 years old, after a few relationships with girls, I had an experience with a male that I had an attraction to who I also worked with and grew up with."  Carter continues, "To me music has always been my temple. Music will ALWAYS be what transcends us and myself. The studio has always been my safe haven. But the ultimate goal for me is to be satisfied. I never want to be a figure of disappointment."  A Tampa, Florida, native, he ends the letter with a quote from singer Boy George, who also has been open in discussing his sexuality.  "The best quote to sum 'I've never felt as though I didn't belong, I just acted as though I did.' â€” Boy George"  Carter's tweet follows his July 15 arrest in Georgia on suspicion of driving under the influence and marijuana possession. His girlfriend, Madison Parker, was in the passenger seat of the car and was also taken into police custody. Carter was released after posting bail for $4,610.
label: real

content: At last night's 53rd Academy of Country Music Awards, artists gathered at the Garden Arena at the MGM Grand in Las Vegas to celebrate their industry and each other's achievements. The show marked an emotional time for country music as artists returned to the city six months after a gunman killed 58 people at the Route 91 Harvest Festival in Oct. 2017 in the deadliest mass shooting in modern U.S. history. But country musicians vowed to look forward and celebrate the healing power of music at the show.  Miranda Lambert took home the first big award of the night -- song of the year for "Tin Man." Here are the winners from the ACM Awards, country music's party of the year.  Jason Aldean performs at ACMAs, reflects on the Las Vegas shooting      2018 Academy of Country Music Awards Winners:  Entertainer of the year: Jason Aldean  Male vocalist of the year: Chris Stapleton  Female vocalist of the year: Miranda Lambert  Single record of the year: "Body Like a Back Road" by Sam Hunt  Video of the year: "It Ain't My Fault" by Brothers Osborne  Vocal event of the year: "The Fighter" by Keith Urban  Vocal duo of the year: Brothers Osborne  Vocal group of the year: Old Dominion  Album of the year: "From a Room: Vol. 1" by Chris Stapleton  Song of the year: "Tin Man" by Miranda Lambert  New female vocalist of the year: Lauren Alaina  New male vocalist of the year: Brett Young  New vocal duo or group of the year: Midland  Songwriter of the year: Rhett Akins
label: real

content: In the wake of multiple sexual misconduct allegations Mario Batali issued another apology to fans via his newsletter on Friday. According to People, the whole thing has caused fresh outrage about the chef online. In the newsletter, Batali wrote:  "As many of you know, this week there has been some news coverage about some of my past behavior. I have made many mistakes and I am so very sorry that I have disappointed my friends, my family, my fans and my team. My behavior was wrong and there are no excuses. I take full responsibility."  "Sharing the joys of Italian food, tradition and hospitality with all of you, each week, is an honor and privilege. Without the support of all of you â€” my fans â€” I would never have a forum in which to expound on this. I will work every day to regain your respect and trust."  There is then a post script that reads:  "In case you're searching for a holiday-inspired breakfast, these Pizza Dough Cinnamon Rolls are a fan favorite."  The newsletter concluded with a photo of the recipe and a link to the recipe on mariobatali.com. Twitter had immediate reactions to the newsletter:  when youâ€™re apologizing for sexual assault and suddenly need a snack pic.twitter.com/IoNr2vCaIf â€” shauna (@goldengateblond) December 16, 2017  What a disappointment, in every possible way pic.twitter.com/GiKChA29WV â€” your friend Helen (@hels) December 16, 2017  Dear @Mariobatali I tried your pizza dough cinnamon rolls. They tasted extra â€œrapey." What other recipes should I try while you are apologizing for sexual assault? â€” Candice AlstrÃ¶m (@cfahooligan) December 16, 2017  The latest apology comes after multiple women accused Batali of sexual misconduct, in investigations published by Eater and The New York Times. He has since stepped down (or has been dramatically removed, in more than one case) from his various businesses including Eataly, and "The Chew."  Follow Delish on Instagram.  Download the Delish app.

content: Embed from Getty Images  One of my most shameful celebrity â€œcrushesâ€ is Diplo. Go ahead and yell at me, I deserve it. You can tell me anything about Diplo too, I know heâ€™s a total douchebag. I canâ€™t help it though â€“ thereâ€™s something about his smug doucheface that I find appealing or hot or something. Sometimes we canâ€™t always explain why weâ€™re attracted to someone. But I would hit it and then I would never tell a soul about it, because banging Diplo is and always should be a shameful secret. Since heâ€™s my shame-crush, I know that he likes women who are pretty young too, which is also gross. Apparently, he was possibly spending time with none other than Kendall Jenner at Coachella. Ugh.  Kendall Jenner is no stranger to getting up close and personal with musicâ€™s biggest names. The model has dated the likes of Harry Styles and A$AP Rocky â€” and now I hear she may have Diplo set in her sights. My spies caught Kendall looking extremely close with the US producerâ€” who counts Katy Perry as an ex â€” at a Coachella bash on Friday. They set tongues wagging after spending lots of time with each other at the party which was thrown to celebrate the launch of a cosmetics brand headed by Â­Kendallâ€™s sisters Kourtney Kardashian and Kylie Jenner. My source at the Palm Springs bash told me: â€œKendall and Diplo were super-flirty at the party. There was lots of touching and some extended hugging. They both appeared to be comfortable and familiar in each otherâ€™s company and hanging off everything the other Â­person said. Diplo was Â­stroking her arm. They were in great spirits. Kendall was toasting the launch of her show on Apple Music radio station Beats 1 while Diplo did a DJ set. It was the talk of the bash. Everyone Â­wondered whether there could be something more going on between them.â€ The pairâ€™s flirting comes amid an ongoing saga in Kendallâ€™s love life. Last weekend, it was reported she ignored rumoured love interest Blake Griffin when they both attended a different bash at the musical festival in California. At the party â€” thrown by Hollywood night spot Bootsy Bellows and McDonaldâ€™s â€” basketball star Blake walked straight past Â­Kendall and the two did not speak the whole night. But, on Thursday, they both had dinner at Delilah restaurant in West Hollywood â€” although they made sure they were not snapped arriving together. A source added: â€œKendall has a lot of male interest and isnâ€™t keen to be tied down in a serious relationship. Diplo is an extremely eligible catch and she seemed very Â­flattered at the attention he was showing her.â€ I also hear Kendall is being paid around Â£450,000 per Â­episode to co-host her new monthly radio show Pizza Boys. Should Diplo decide to pop round for a takeaway, they can afford to splash out on a few side dishes.  [From The Sun]  Iâ€™m sure some of you will be like â€œKendall wasnâ€™t flirting with Diplo because sheâ€™s gay.â€ First of all, lesbians flirt with men all the time. Secondly, Kendall recently spoke about the lesbian rumors which have surrounded her for years, and I tend to believe her on this one thing: if she was gay or bisexual, she would just BE gay or bisexual. Itâ€™s not like her family is super-conservative or anti-LGBTQ. She would talk about it and date women openly and it would not be a big deal at all. I think itâ€™s more than likely sheâ€™s a straight woman with a masculine energy. I also think itâ€™s likely that sheâ€™s the most â€œquietâ€ about her love life among the sisters. Soâ€¦ basically, I sort of believe this. I think Diplo and Kendall Jenner hooked up at Coachella. I doubt itâ€™s true love. And sheâ€™s probably ashamed of herself and sheâ€™ll never tell a soul about the hookup because, again, Diplo is gross (and so fâ€“king hot).  Also: Emily Ratajkowski and Kendall look like twins to me.  Embed from Getty Images  Embed from Getty Images

content: Gwyneth Paltrow is having a bit of pre-wedding jitters!  The 45-year-old actress, who is engaged to marry producer Brad Falchuk, opened up about her prospective on love and marriage to Sarah Jessica Parker on a new episode of her weekly goop podcast.  Get push notifications with news, features and more.  â€œIâ€™m about to get married again,â€ Paltrow stated at the beginning of the podcast, adding that while sheâ€™s â€œa little scared,â€ sheâ€™s also â€œvery optimistic.â€  â€œI think you should be [optimistic],â€ the 53-year-old Sex and the City alum replied, explaining that Paltrow is in a completely different place now then when she was getting ready to marry her first husband Chris Martin over a decade ago.  â€œYouâ€™re a grown-up woman and youâ€™re making a choice for entirely different reasons. Perspective and life experience is everything,â€ Parker remarked. â€œI think the value of being a sophisticated woman and choosing marriage is promising, donâ€™t you?â€  Agreeing, Paltrow commented on how difficult it is to choose the right partner when you get married at a young age. â€œItâ€™s such a crazy game of chance because who knows if youâ€™re going to grow in parallel, if your paths are going to diverge, [or] whatâ€™s going to happen,â€ she said.  Gwyneth Paltrow and Brad Falchuk Splash News  RELATED: Gwyneth Paltrow Says She Regrets Not Having a Third Child: â€˜I Really Wanted Another Oneâ€™  Paltrow and Falchuk first met in 2010 when she made a guest appearance on Glee as Holly Holliday, a role for which she won an Emmy Award. The two officially started dating in the summer of 2014 and confirmed their engagement in January in Goop Magazineâ€˜s Sex & Love issue.  While details about her upcoming nuptials remain unknown, the pair are set to tie the knot later this year.  She previously married the Coldplay frontman in 2003, before announcing they were â€œconsciously uncouplingâ€ in March 2014. The amicable exes share daughter Apple, 14, and son Moses, 12.  RELATED VIDEO: Gwyneth Paltrow Is â€˜Excitedâ€™ to Start Wedding Planning: â€˜I Feel Like a 21-Year-Old!â€™  Paltrow went on to ask Parker, who has been married to Matthew Broderick since 1997, if she had any insight on â€œthe things that keep people growing together.â€  â€œIâ€™m not sure,â€ Parker replied, adding that something sheâ€™s noticed recently is that while there are always going to be things about your partner that irritate you, getting upset about the small things doesnâ€™t really matter in the long run.  â€œYeah it bothers me,â€ she explained. â€œBut I also try to remember or think of how many things I do that must really bother him.â€  Sarah Jessica Parker and Matthew Broderick Dia Dipasupil/Getty  Paltrow went on to add that as she gets older, sheâ€™s come to view intimate relationships as â€œa study into everything thatâ€™s wrong with you.â€  â€œYou can sort of convince yourself, â€˜Uh, this person is irritating,â€™ but itâ€™s like, â€˜Why is that triggering? What am I projecting? What is still not healed with me.â€™ â€

content: Maci Bookout was granted a two-year order of protection against ex-boyfriend Ryan Edwards after she claimed he threatened to hurt her and take their son.  The Teen Mom OG star was granted the order of protection against Edwards on Monday, according to E! News.  Edwardsâ€™ attorney Jonathan Turner told the outlet Edwards was not allowed to be within 100 feet of Bookout, her husband Taylor McKinney and their two children, Jayde 2, Maverick, 24 months. Bookout shares oldest son, Bentley, 9, with Edwards.  The order of protection will not affect his ability to see their son Bentley, Turner said as it will give him â€œa lot more protection against any false allegations, allows him to avoid getting arrested without a hearing first, and allows him to be around his son most importantly.â€  Representatives for Edwards and Bookout did not immediately respond to PEOPLEâ€™s request for comment.  The mother of three initially filed for an order of protection in March and listed her three children, Jayde, Maverick and Bentley in the protection order. McKinney also filed an order of protection against Edwards.  She shares Bentley with Edwards, while her youngest two she shares with husband Taylor McKinney.  Maci Bookout, Ryan Edwards John Phillips/Getty; MTV  Bookout also claimed in court documents obtained by E! News at the time that Edwards had â€œleft voicemail messages threatening to show up at my house and take my sonâ€ and alleged he â€œhas made threats to show up and hurt me if I donâ€™t answer my phone.â€  The MTV star also alleged that Edwards had appeared at Bentleyâ€™s baseball game in May 2017 â€œunder the influence of heroin and got in my face, yelling and threatening to hurt me,â€ RadarOnline reported at the time.  Get push notifications with news, features and more.  Want to keep up on the latest from PEOPLE? Sign up for our daily newsletter to get our best stories of the day delivered straight to your inbox.  Edwards was previously shown driving impaired during the season 6 finale of Teen Mom OG, while on the way to his wedding with Mackenzie Standifer Edwards, who was seen at times taking the steering wheel from him while on the road.  The news of the order comes after Edwards was arrested in Tennessee in March for violating terms of his probation stemming from a prior heroin possession charge.
label: real

content: Get the latest from TODAY Sign up for our newsletter  / Source: TODAY By Donna Freydkin  Since actress Christina Applegate was diagnosed with breast cancer in 2008 and had a double mastectomy thereafter, sheâ€™s taken steps to change her entire lifestyle, from the food she eats to the rest she gets. She also founded the Right Action for Women, which helps at-risk women pay for MRI screenings and testing.  But the actress revealed in a TODAY.com exclusive that she recently took an additional step to prevent another cancer diagnosis: She had her ovaries and fallopian tubes removed. Read on for our conversation with the actress, whoâ€™s busy raising her daughter Sadie, 6, with musician hubby Martyn LeNoble.  First off, letâ€™s catch up on your health. How are you doing?  You're the first person I'm telling this. Two weeks ago, I had my ovaries and [fallopian] tubes removed. My cousin passed away from ovarian cancer in 2008. I could prevent that. Thatâ€™s how Iâ€™ve taken control of everything. Itâ€™s a relief. Thatâ€™s one other thing off the table. Now, letâ€™s hope I donâ€™t get hit by a bus.  What message do you want to send to women?  If youâ€™re BRCA positive, itâ€™s highly possible youâ€™ll develop cancer in your lifetime. The first thing is to be really diligent about what youâ€™re putting into your body, as far as what kind of food youâ€™re eating. Organic is expensive. I get that. I donâ€™t want to alienate anyone who canâ€™t pay for that. But maybe skip your morning latte and get organic vegetables for the week. Try to stay away from the foods that are filled with chemicals. Be a little more diligent and carve out as much of the bad stuff that you can. The other big killer is stress. Thatâ€™s a hard thing to say to people especially right now. Weâ€™re living in a bizarre time. Weâ€™re bombarded by whatâ€™s going on in our world. Breathe deeper. Thatâ€™s a big one for me. I used to be a stressed out person. Iâ€™m not anymore. I try to find the lining in everything in life.  Christina Applegate Stacie McChesney / Getty Images  I know you eat super clean.  We grow our own vegetables. Thatâ€™s not an option for everyone. But just get a tomato plant! Weâ€™re a 100 percent organic house. My daughter is a vegetarian and practically vegan. Thatâ€™s her choice. Thatâ€™s how she eats. Weâ€™re really conscious about what we buy. Get some kale! Plant some green kale in your backyard and throw it into everything.  Itâ€™s pretty impressive that you founded Right Action for Women, because these tests cost a fortune and most women canâ€™t afford them.  Weâ€™re at this place where we need to sit down and figure out the future of what it is that weâ€™re doing and get into more of the BRCA tests for women. Thatâ€™s a huge cost for a lot of people who donâ€™t have perfect insurance. If you do know you have the gene, it gives you an empowerment about your lifestyle. Iâ€™ve been a stay-at-home mom and focusing on my daughter the last two years. Weâ€™re moving forward now.  It must weigh on you that you have a daughter, and it must make breast cancer that much more of a personal issue  Of course. The chances that my daughter is BRCA positive are very high. I look at her and feed her the cleanest foods. I try to keep her stress levels down. Iâ€™m doing everything I can on my end knowing that in 20 years, sheâ€™ll have to start getting tested. Hopefully by then there will be advancements. It breaks my heart to think thatâ€™s a possibility.  Do you get checked out regularly?  I donâ€™t need mammograms anymore. I donâ€™t have breasts. I go every six months to my oncologist. It used to be every three months. They still check me out as if I had all my parts. Thatâ€™s never going to go away. If you know youâ€™re high risk, you need to go start as soon as possible.  Otherwise, whatâ€™s your life like these days?  I feel good. I keep my life really simple. Iâ€™m very fortunate right now to have that freedom to not work. I love being my daughterâ€™s mother and being 24/7 here with her, doing what I need to do, making her meals, taking her to soccer. I work at her school six or seven hours a week. Iâ€™m all in. That is my job. I love my life right now. Iâ€™ve been very fortunate to be able to take a minute and itâ€™s been wonderful.
label: real

content: BRAD Pitt has apologised to Jennifer Aniston for leaving her for Angelina Jolie.  The actor famously left the Friends star after meeting Angelina Jolie on the set of Mr and Mrs Smith, but since splitting from Ange last year he is reportedly determined to right any wrongs he made in the past.  Splash News 8 Brad Pitt has said sorry to Jennifer Aniston, according to reports  AFP 8 Brad and Jen were married from 2000 to 2005  Getty - Contributor 8 Jennifer was dumped for Angelina Jolie  A source told In Touch Weekly: â€œHeâ€™s been determined to apologise for everything he put her through, and thatâ€™s exactly what he did.  â€œIt was the most intimate conversation Brad and Jen have ever had.â€  The apology was reportedly incredibly difficult for Jennifer, 48, to hear after all these years.  â€œJen was overcome with emotion. All the hurt feelings and resentment sheâ€™d suppressed for years came flooding to the surface, and she broke down in tears,â€ the source revealed.  â€œHe apologised to Jen for being an absentee husband, for being stoned and bored much of the time. He also made amends for leaving her for Angelina.â€  Itâ€™s thought the former couple have now reached a â€˜level of closenessâ€™ they never thought possible following their bitter split in 2005.  EPA 8 Brad and Jen were Hollywood's golden couple  Getty - Contributor 8 Jennifer was reportedly very emotional when Brad apologised  Getty - Contributor 8 Jennifer is now married to Justin Theroux  Brad and Jennifer were married for five years before he met Angelina and went on to marry and have children with her.  At the time of the split, Jennifer told Vanity Fair magazine: "Iâ€™m a human being, having a human experience in front of the world. I wish it werenâ€™t in front of the world. I try really hard to rise above it. Absolutely.â€  Alamy 8 Brad met Angelina on the set of Mr and Mrs Smith in 2005  Rex Features 8 The couple announced their split in September 2016  Jennifer has since married the actor and screenwriter Justin Theroux, 45, tying-the-knot in 2015 after four years of dating. I didnâ€™t have a partner to share it with,â€ added Nicole, who at the time had recently broken up with Tom Cruise. â€œI was flailing, emotionally and personally. So, to win and Emmy and be in love and have my familyâ€¦ Itâ€™s amazing.â€  â€œI was alone. content: Get the latest from TODAY Sign up for our newsletter  / Source: TODAY By Shane Lou  Olivia Newton-John has announced she is postponing June dates on her North American tour due to another battle with breast cancer.  A statement was posted Tuesday on the official website and Facebook page for the 68-year-old singer-actress.  â€œThe back pain that initially caused her to postpone the first half of her concert tour, has turned out to be breast cancer that has metastasized to the sacrum,â€ the statement reads.  â€œIn addition to natural wellness therapies, Olivia will complete a short course of photon radiation therapy and is confident she will be back later in the year, better than ever, to celebrate her shows.â€  The statement includes a quote from Newton-John: â€œI decided on my direction of therapies after consultation with my doctors and natural therapists and the medical team at my Olivia Newton-John Cancer Wellness and Research Centre in Melbourne, Australia.â€  Newton-John performing in the U.K. in January. Ross Gilmore / Redferns/Getty Images  Newton-John previously postponed some shows earlier in May for what she described at the time as â€œa long running issue with sciaticaâ€ that was causing her back pain.  The â€œGreaseâ€ star was first diagnosed with breast cancer in 1992, on the same weekend her father died of cancer. She lost her sister, Rona Newton-John, to brain cancer in 2013.  Last fall Newton-John released an album with Amy Sky and Beth Nielsen Chapman, â€œLiv On,â€ that was inspired by their experiences with loss and illness, including the death of Newton-John's sister.  â€œItâ€™s to help people through grief and through healing, whatever time it takes you,â€ she told Hoda Kotb and Kathie Lee Gifford in October.  Tuesdayâ€™s statement noted that Newton-John will reschedule her postponed concert dates in the coming weeks.  RELATED
label: real

content: Just hours ahead of the â€œSaturday Night Liveâ€ Season 42 finale, Vanessa Bayer has announced she is leaving the sketch comedy series after seven seasons, Variety has confirmed. This casting news comes just two days after Bobby Moynihan shared he was departing after nine seasons on the late-night staple.  â€œThank you SNL for 7 years of laughs, love and incredible memories,â€ she posted on Instagram. â€œIt has been a dream come true.â€  Bayer also posted an image of a sketch written by Colin Jost, saying â€œThanks for this goodbye sketch at the table.â€  Saturday nightâ€™s â€œSNLâ€ hosted by Dwayne â€œThe Rockâ€ Johnson with Katy Perry as musical guest will mark the final appearances for both Moynihan and Bayer.  Bayer had been with the NBC variety show since 2010 where she spent two years as a featured player before being promoted to repertory during Season 38. She is currently the longest-serving female cast member.  Some of Bayerâ€™s most iconic characters and celebrity impressions include Miley Cyrus, Rachel from â€œFriends,â€ Jacob the bar mitzvah boy on â€œWeekend Update,â€ and Rebecca Stern-Markowicz, co-host of â€œJ-Pop America Fun Time Now.â€ During her tenure on â€œSNL,â€ Bayer was twice nominated for an Online Film & Television Association Award, and earned an American Comedy Award nod as well. She also had a main role in Amy Schumerâ€™s â€œTrainwreck.â€  â€œSaturday Night Liveâ€ airs simultaneously on both coasts tonight at 8:30 p.m. EST/8:30 p.m. PST on NBC.  Deadline first broke the news of Bayerâ€™s exit.

content: Mr. Weinstein, who is now a Hollywood pariah, has an array of legal problems that are separate from the bankruptcy case. Prosecutors in New York, Los Angeles and London are pursuing possible criminal cases against him. A lawsuit filed last month by Mr. Schneiderman will continue. Mr. Weinstein also faces additional civil suits, including one filed by the British actress Kadian Noble, who is suing him for sex trafficking.  But the bankruptcy filing does halt an array of lawsuits against the company, including those filed by women who contend that the studio facilitated misconduct by Mr. Weinstein. Those women will now have to line up behind the studioâ€™s secured creditors â€” who themselves are likely to be paid pennies on the dollar, according to bankruptcy lawyers.  The upshot is that women alleging abuse may now have a harder time recovering damages.  The filing, which was expected, ended a chaotic five-month effort to keep the Weinstein Company afloat.  In the fall, after The New York Times and The New Yorker revealed allegations of sexual harassment and rape, Mr. Weinsteinâ€™s younger brother and partner in the studio, Bob Weinstein, unsuccessfully scrambled to line up bridge loans to keep the company operating. He then sold â€œPaddington 2â€ rights to Warner Bros., which bought time but resulted in a lawsuit.  By early February, to the disbelief of many in the film industry, it seemed as if the Weinstein Company had found a way forward. A group of investors, including the billionaire Ron Burkle and Lantern Capital, had made an offer to buy most of the studioâ€™s assets, which include the TV series â€œProject Runwayâ€ and the rights to â€œLion,â€ â€œDjango Unchainedâ€ and about 275 other films.  The investor group, managed by Maria Contreras-Sweet, who ran the Small Business Administration under President Barack Obama, had offered to pay off what it believed was the Weinstein Companyâ€™s debt â€” about $225 million. In return, it would receive most of the studioâ€™s assets, which Ms. Contreras-Sweet planned to use to start a new, female-led film company.  But then Mr. Schneiderman threw the brakes on a sale, filing a lawsuit alleging that the studio and the Weinstein brothers had violated various state and city laws. He also said the proposed sale to Ms. Contreras-Sweetâ€™s group was unacceptable because it did not adequately compensate victims, protect employees and ensure that those who enabled or perpetuated Mr. Weinsteinâ€™s conduct would not be rewarded.
label: real

content: In case you wanted proof of your waning youth, Thursday marks the 10th anniversary of Britney Spears and Kevin Federlineâ€™s wedding â€” a day when a promising young pop star and a dude nicknamed â€œMeat Poleâ€ decided to throw caution to the wind and say â€œI do.â€  â€œTen years â€” it totally freaks me out,â€ says wedding planner Alyson Fox, reflecting on the September 18, 2004, nuptials. The day marked Foxâ€™s first (and only) celebrity wedding. While it was originally planned as a big October wedding at the Bacara in Santa Barbara, things rapidly changed after the paparazzi figured out the date and location. Fox was left with about 10 days to organize a completely new, surprise wedding â€” and, not trusting any other venue to keep the secret, she held it at her own house.  Most Britney fans probably donâ€™t celebrate her short-lived marriageâ€™s anniversary; some even see it as a key moment in a downward spiral from which she has only recently recovered. Still, though Britney filed for divorce in 2006, Fox holds that marriage dear.  TIME spoke to Fox about the whirlwind wedding, young love and the groomsmensâ€™ infamous white Juicy velour â€œpimpâ€ tracksuits.  TIME: Britney and Kevin Federlineâ€™s engagement was huge. Did you think that this would be one of the biggest weddings-  Alyson Fox: â€”of my career? Yes, I mean, she is Britney Spears. I first interviewed with Felicia, her assistant for years, and I didnâ€™t know who I was meeting with, just that it was a VIPâ€¦ I met Britney and her mom the next day and they all couldnâ€™t be nicer. The sweetest. I mean theyâ€™re from the South. Britneyâ€™s so polite, she kept calling me Miss Alyson, and I was like, â€˜Oh my God donâ€™t do that; that makes me feel old.â€™  And then you met Kevin.  They were like any young couple. Very much in love, very touchy feely.  What was the original wedding going to be like?  They came up with a list of 200 to 250 people, and we thought the Bacara would be great. We were designing the most beautiful but not over the top, elegant but shabby chic, gorgeous but fun eventâ€¦ It was a really fun experience. I have not one negative thing to say until we had to move the whole wedding.  So what happened?  A publication printed the location and date of the wedding. I got a call from a very unhappy Kevin. [Unhappy at the situation not her.] Even though I told them that we had the best security team and it could still go on without a hitch, they didnâ€™t want 100 million people standing outside trying to take pictures, ruining the intimacy and privacy of that event. So we had to go to Plan B, and we had to do it fast.  You had a â€œPlan Bâ€?  Well, we planned it in 10 days or lessâ€¦ Everything was already in the works, Monique Lhuillier was making all the gowns that were basically ready, all the vendors were in place for the big wedding â€” we just didnâ€™t have a location. In that week we decided we canâ€™t do it at a hotel, we canâ€™t do a venue because people were going to know. We limited the guest list to the two families and the wedding party, and then we talked to Britney and Kevin about doing a surprise wedding. Nobody would know.  Not even Britneyâ€™s mom?  No. Nobody knewâ€¦ We told everyone and our vendors we were having an engagement party. We tried to use every vendor we could who was going to help at the wedding.  And you would throw it at your house in Studio City?  Well, their place wasnâ€™t ready yetâ€¦ The vendors made the house look stunning. It was so beautiful. I only wish they could have had more peopleâ€¦ Every person who walked in that night, we handed then an invitation, they opened it up and it said â€œsurprise!â€ you are here for the wedding and not the engagement party. And we would direct them to the room where they would change into their gowns and tuxedosâ€¦  Tuxedos? I thought the men were wearing those white Juicy velour jumpsuitsâ€¦  No! Thatâ€™s what they left the house in. They were in tuxedos and gowns. Everybody made such a big deal about that, but thatâ€™s what Juicy did for every celebrity who got married. Theyâ€™d send them the cute little tracksuits. I asked Britney and Kevin what they wanted printed on the back, and Britney said, â€œMaids! Maids will be cute!â€ And it was. It was cute! And he said â€œPimpsâ€ which was adorableâ€¦ People are closed-minded. It was a joke, it was for fun. It was Juicy tracksuits! 10 years ago people would have given anything for a Juicy tracksuit.  You must not have gotten a lot of sleep that week.  Oh I didnâ€™t sleep that week. And I didnâ€™t sleep the week after, because there were all these stories going on [at the time] that they werenâ€™t really married, and all this B.S. People are going to think what theyâ€™re going to think, but I know the truth. They were wonderful people and Iâ€™ll say that until the day I die. To this day I donâ€™t talk to a lot of people about it because I still feel protective over them. Unfortunately it didnâ€™t work out â€” but what is it, 60% of marriages that donâ€™t?  Read TIMEâ€™s 1999 profile of Britney Spears here, in the archives: A Sweet Sensation
label: fake

content: The Kardashian family feud raged on as the sisters disagreed about who should be invited to momager Kris Jennerâ€˜s Christmas Eve party.  On Sunday nightâ€™s episode of Keeping Up with the Kardashians, things were still tense between Kim and KhloÃ© and eldest sibling Kourtney.  â€œWe really havenâ€™t resolved anything with Kourtney since the therapy sessions. We have so much more to hash out,â€ Kim told the camera, adding that she felt like they were all â€œwalking on egg shells.â€  Making things worse? Kourtney didnâ€™t want Scott Disick, the father of her three children, invited to Krisâ€™ annual blowout â€” because then-boyfriend Younes Bendjima would be there.  â€œHeâ€™s still part of our family,â€ Kris insisted.  â€œWhat about my dad?â€ Kendall Jenner interjected, referring to Caitlyn Jenner, whoâ€™d fallen out with Kris and the Kardashian girls following the publication of her explosive memoir.  â€œNobody thats coming would even know how to respond to her,â€ Kris argued, adding that she has a friendly relationship with Scott and wanted him present.  â€œOh, you didnâ€™t have a relationship with my dad for 25 years?â€ Kendall asked angrily.  But Kim and KhloÃ© were on Scottâ€™s side.  RELATED VIDEO: Kim and KhloÃ© Kardashian Attend Sister Therapy with Kourtney After Calling Her a â€˜Raging Bitchâ€™  â€œI donâ€™t care that Kourtney has a boyfriend. I have a girlfriend. i donâ€™t give a sâ€”,â€ he told them later. (Heâ€™s been dating Sofia Richie since the fall.)  Meanwhile, Kourtney found an ally in Kendall.  â€œIt should be Younes going to the party and Scott coming to Christmas morning,â€ Kendall said, adding that it â€œblew my mindâ€ how her mom and sisters didnâ€™t recognize that banning Caitlyn yet welcoming Scott was hypocritical.  â€œWhy is Scott coming to the party more important than my feelings?â€ Kourtney asked, mentioning that she was considering taking her kids out of town for the holiday to avoid drama.  â€œThatâ€™s not okay,â€ KhloÃ© said when Kendall relayed the news.  â€œDo you think thatâ€™s like a cry for help, a cry for attention? Is she the new Rob?â€ Kim asked.  Kourtney brought Kendall to an ice-skating trip with her kids, and they discussed the rift further.  â€œYou have to spend Christmas with us,â€ Kendall said.  â€œI just donâ€™t know if weâ€™re going to get along if weâ€™re all in the same place,â€ Kourtney replied. â€œThe meanness and stuff, itâ€™s not worth it.â€  Luckily, Kendall convinced her to stick around Calabasas. â€œI think you guys should make up and not worry about it, because itâ€™s the holidays,â€ she said  And when Kourtney realized she wanted her kids to be around their cousins and aunts, she agreed.  So, she decided to talk to Scott directly about her concerns.  â€œI heard through the grapevine youâ€™re the one person who doesnâ€™t want me to go,â€ he said.  â€œI think that our lives are changing,â€ she said. â€œIf my boyfriend is going to the party, if youâ€™re there, I just donâ€™t want any disrespect. Iâ€™ve been feeling super anxious â€¦ but I donâ€™t want the kids to not have their dad there.â€  In the end, Scott and Younes both attended, and even Caitlyn was invited, though she skipped out on the festivities.  â€œNot sharing this whole experience with my family and my kids, it wouldnâ€™t have felt right,â€ Kourtney concluded, adding that getting in the Christmas spirit helped her resolve her issues with her sisters.
